title: come on RIOT,all i ever wanted is a ping thats lower than 60 for the entire east coast plaeyrs./

replies.body: They just need to make the North Latin Server the east coast one and we'll all be good. Seriously if that server wasn't in Spanish (even though I'm Bilingual) id be on it and transfer all my accounts to it. Considering the location for their servers are in Florida.... Like go make a quick smurf on it. The ping will amaze you.

Meanwhile in South Korea...

Korean streamers throwing tantrums when they get more than 20 ping... (To be fair, this makes sense since South Korea has the best internet in the world and Korea as a region is extremely competitive by comparison). 



Anyway, as an East Coast player, I can verify that I do not enjoy trying to execute difficult mechanical plays when my ping is constantly above 100. Lag and frame-rate drops aside for the less fortunate, those of us living in the Packet-Loss Hell on the East Coast who are actually already skilled and practiced and have a natural latency disadvantage would very much like to eliminate this problem.

The only thing it affects for me with my 120 ping is that last second zonyas and qss's are the biggest disedvatages. Csing is REALLY HARD WITH MAGES ON HIGH PING in comparison to low ping. I played on 60 ping once and my cs at 10 was on average like 12 higher for my mages because you have to time it so perfectly, 12 CS IS A HUGE ADVANTAGE THAT I WOULD HAVE IF MY PING WAS LOWER
I can CS with Soraka and Anivia AA's at 150 just jine.

> [{quoted}](name=Ariel the Cruel,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=UrP9beU3,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-07-05T20:56:49.033+0000)
>
> I can CS with Soraka and Anivia AA's at 150 just jine.

https://33.media.tumblr.com/2653a59cbfc5d86300e62cdd31ce52db/tumblr_msgs7odgZv1s0hia6o1_500.gif
please learn how the internet works.
This has nothing to do with Riot. Move this to the board of your ISP or complain to the government.
Not really since Riot are the ones that host the servers which the game is played on.
But is the problem the server itself or is it the infrastructure between you and it.

I would love a lower ping. currently 110-130ish~ (I'm on the east coast)
playable definitely but messes with how fast i want to do things and I definitely feel like somethings are just wrong in close skirmishes.

I agree, my ping is at 42 and it's too low. 
It's almost unplayable, Riot Games please fix it for me. 
Thanks.

60 is great ping. I play with a consistent 120-140, people are whining about 60 really?

edit: also on west coast
